name: Housing Authority of Somerset
description: Public housing authority serving Somerset and Pulaski County providing affordable housing solutions including public housing (low rent), Housing Choice Vouchers (Section 8), and Family Self-Sufficiency programs. Features a dual-use Administration Building and Learning Center with technology resources, Neighborhood Network Center, and Colonial Village Community Center. Offers comprehensive support services and community programs for low-income families.
source: Verified from official website and multiple authoritative sources
eligibility: Low-income families and individuals meeting HUD income guidelines
fees: Based on income; typically 30% of adjusted gross income
notes: HUD-funded public housing authority serving Lake Cumberland area. Features technology-rich learning center and community programs. Provides access to various support services including child care, energy assistance, employment, and family services. Online application available at hasomerset.housingmanager.com.
